mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(QNA_NO) FROM PARTNER_QNA WHERE QNA_DELYN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT CDC.COMD_NAME, QNA.QNA_NO, QNA.QNA_TITLE, QNA.QNA_CONTENT, PT.PT_NAME, QNA.QNA_DATE, QNA.QNA_STATE, QNA.QUE_FILECODE, QNA.QNA_ANS, QNA.PT_NO FROM PARTNER PT, PARTNER_QNA QNA, COMMON_DETAIL_CODE CDC WHERE PT.PT_NO = QNA.PT_NO AND PT.PT_CODE = CDC.COMD_CODE AND QNA_DELYN = 'N' AND QNA.QNA_NO = #{qnaNo}) N LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_DATA FD ON FD.FILE_OWNER = #{fileOwner}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT CDC.COMD_NAME, QNA.QNA_NO, QNA.QNA_TITLE, QNA.QNA_CONTENT, PT.PT_NAME, QNA.QNA_DATE, QNA.QNA_STATE, QNA.QUE_FILECODE, QNA.QNA_ANS, QNA.PT_NO, QNA.QNA_DELYN FROM PARTNER PT, PARTNER_QNA QNA, COMMON_DETAIL_CODE CDC WHERE PT.PT_NO = QNA.PT_NO AND PT.PT_CODE = CDC.COMD_CODE AND QNA.QNA_NO = #{qnaNo}) N LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_DATA FD ON FD.FILE_OWNER = #{fileOwner}
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTNER_QNA SET QNA_TITLE = #{qnaTitle}, QNA_CONTENT = #{qnaContent}, QUE_FILECODE = #{queFilecode}, QNA_DATE = sysdate WHERE QNA_NO = #{qnaNo} AND QNA_DELYN = 'N'
mapper.delete: UPDATE PARTNER_QNA SET QNA_DELYN='Y' WHERE QNA_NO = #{qnaNo}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO, FILE_OWNER, FILE_SAVEPATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_MIME, FILE_REALNAME, FILE_SAVENAME, FILE_SAVEDATE, FILE_DELYN, FILE_DOWNCOUNT, FILE_FANCYSIZE FROM FILE_DATA WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE FILE_DATA SET FILE_DOWNCOUNT = FILE_DOWNCOUNT+1 WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
mapper.select: select FILE_OWNER, FILE_SAVEPATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_MIME, FILE_REALNAME, FILE_SAVENAME, FILE_SAVEDATE, FILE_DELYN, FILE_DOWNCOUNT, FILE_FANCYSIZE FROM FILE_DATA WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
